title: Kick-off
description: Sunderland - playing in their blue away kit - get us underway

title: Goal!
description: Spurs get off to a fantastic start through Vertonghen

title: Yellow card
description: Jan Vertonghen is booked for a late challenge on Defoe 30-yards from goal

title: Goal!
description: Larsson stepped to the free-kick up and bent a brilliant ball over the wall to give Lloris no chance at all

title: Goal!
description: Eriksens first time low shot goes in off the post!

title: Full-time
description: Well thats it. Eriksen is the Spurs hero once more and Sunderland leave with nothing
